meaningMnemonic: The radical for <radical>rain</radical> and the kanji for <kanji>rain</kanji> are the same thing.
readingMnemonic: What if the <kanji>rain</kanji> actually tried to <reading>aim</reading> (あめ) for you? As in, drops would move out of their normal flight path just to hit you on your head? You'd be a lot wetter, that's for sure.
